company: The Chinese University of Hong Kong
title: Research Assistant

en: Optimizing batch sizes and intermediate node buffer sizes to enhance transmission efficiency under the batched sparse codes (BATS) scheme.
Leading a team to develop a Python simulator to replicate wireless communication in multi-hop networks with BATS Codes as transmission method.
Employing the simulator to measure maximum packet reception rates over time at the destination node in Line network scenarios with packet-loss.
